name: auth-seed
description: Autonomous auth composer -- discovers security requirements, selects auth modules, installs them, and wires the auth context + session management. Delivers a working authentication system.
postMessage:
Auth Seed installed at .claude/skills/auth-seed/SKILL.md

Describe your application and security needs. The skill composes a complete auth system:

Core: login-form, signup-form, password-reset
Enterprise: sso-saml, biometric
Compliance: age-verification

Not a list -- a wired auth system with session management, protected routes, and auth context.
